title: Chinese ‘Journalist’ Didn’t Give New Price Tag to Statue of Unity
subtitle: A Google reverse image search revealed that the woman in the Facebook post is not a Chinese journalist. She is Hua Chunying, the spokesperson for China’s Foreign Ministry.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The 182 metre-high Sardar Patel statue near the Sardar Sarovar Dam in Gujarat has hogged the newsreels for obvious reasons. Being the tallest statue of the world, it has had its fair share of attention, but it has also started bouncing off fake news sources as well.

A post put up by Facebook page Bjp Bhagao Desh Bachao Abhyaan on 4 November claims that an eminent Chinese journalist has revealed that the Statue of Unity costs Rs 342 crore and not Rs 3,000 crore, as has been reported.

At the time of publishing this article, the post had been shared 226 times on Facebook.
